title: Here's a reading list of 20 articles up to 2022 that cover various aspects of multimodal machine learning (ML), including its challenges, current directions, and domains of application
**"Multimodal Machine Learning: A Survey and Taxonomy"** by Tadas Baltrušaitis, Chaitanya Ahuja, and Louis-Philippe Morency
A comprehensive survey that provides a taxonomy and discusses the challenges and future directions in multimodal ML
**"Deep Multimodal Representation Learning: A Survey"** by Hao Wang, Dit-Yan Yeung
This article surveys deep learning approaches for multimodal representation learning
**"Multimodal Sentiment Analysis: Addressing Key Issues and Setting Up the Baselines"** by Amir Zadeh
note: Minghai Chen, Soujanya Poria, Erik Cambria, Louis-Philippe Morency (2016

title: Discusses the challenges and baseline methods for multimodal sentiment analysis
**"Multimodal Machine Learning: A Survey on Recent Advances and Trends"** by Paul Pu Liang, Louis-Philippe Morency, Ruslan Salakhutdinov
Reviews recent advances and trends in multimodal ML, focusing on integration techniques and applications
**"Challenges in Multimodal Machine Learning: A Survey and Framework"** by Tadas Baltrušaitis, Chaitanya Ahuja, Louis-Philippe Morency
Identifies and discusses the key challenges in multimodal ML
**"Multimodal Learning with Deep Boltzmann Machines"** by Nitish Srivastava, Ruslan Salakhutdinov
Introduces a deep learning approach for multimodal learning using Boltzmann machines
**"Multimodal Emotion Recognition from Speech and Text"** by Soujanya Poria
Explores the integration of speech and text for emotion recognition
**"Multimodal Machine Learning for Healthcare: Methods and Applications"** by Mohammad Taha Bahadori
Discusses the application of multimodal ML in healthcare, including methods and case studies
**"Multimodal Learning for Video Classification"** by Andrej Karpathy, George Toderici, Sanketh Shetty, Thomas Leung, Rahul Sukthankar, Li Fei-Fei
Examines the use of multimodal learning for video classification tasks
**"Multimodal Machine Learning for Automated Media Analysis"** by Florian Metze, Louis-Philippe Morency, Tadas Baltrušaitis
Focuses on the application of multimodal ML in media analysis
**"Multimodal Deep Learning for Robust RGB-D Object Recognition"** by Lior Bo, Xiaofeng Ren
Investigates the use of multimodal deep learning for object recognition using RGB-D data
**"Multimodal Machine Learning for Human-Computer Interaction: A Review"** by Louis-Philippe Morency, Rada Mihalcea, Pradeep Dasigi
Reviews the application of multimodal ML in human-computer interaction
**"Multimodal Machine Learning for Financial Forecasting"** by Yao Zhang, Qiang Liu
Discusses the use of multimodal ML for financial forecasting
**"Multimodal Machine Learning for Autonomous Driving: A Survey"** by Hang Zhao
Surveys the application of multimodal ML in autonomous driving
**"Multimodal Machine Learning for Social Media Analysis"** by Munmun De Choudhury
Explores the use of multimodal ML for analyzing social media content
**"Multimodal Machine Learning for Medical Imaging: A Review"** by Geert Litjens, Thijs Kooi, Babak Ehteshami Bejnordi, et al
Reviews the application of multimodal ML in medical imaging
**"Multimodal Machine Learning for Natural Language Processing: A Survey"** by Soujanya Poria
note: Erik Cambria, Devamanyu Hazarika, Navonil Majumder (2018

title: Surveys the integration of multimodal ML techniques in natural language processing
**"Multimodal Machine Learning for Human Activity Recognition: A Review"** by Zhiwu Huang
note: Ruiping Wang, Shiguang Shan, Xilin Chen (2015

title: Reviews the application of multimodal ML in human activity recognition
**"Multimodal Machine Learning for Affective Computing: A Survey"** by Zixing Zhang, Björn Schuller
Discusses the use of multimodal ML in affective computing
**"Multimodal Machine Learning for Robotics: A Survey"** by Abhinav Gupta, Alexei A
Surveys the application of multimodal ML in robotics
These articles should provide a solid foundation for understanding the various aspects of multimodal machine learning, including its challenges, current directions, and diverse applications
